content: I've been going through the toolbox and finding all sorts of interesting things, including an old pocket watch and a letter opener that my grandfather used to use. I've also been using some of the tools to fix up my own house, which has been a nice feeling. Speaking of my own house, I've been thinking about doing some landscaping in the backyard to make it more functional and visually appealing. Can you give me some ideas on how to design a patio and a small garden?
